Detailed Description

class that stores a vector/tensor state

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ebl::state_idx::state_idx ( parameter *  st  ) 

this appends the state_idx into the same Srg as the state_idx passed as argument. This is useful for allocating multiple state_idx inside a parameter. This replaces the Lush function alloc_state_idx.
